text: Ignacio Lucas Varela (born 20 July 1990) is an Argentine football player. He plays for Serie D club F.C. Vado. He also holds Italian citizenship. ==Club career== He made his Primera B Nacional debut for Ferro Carril Oeste on 16 April 2011 in a game against CAI. In December 2019, Varela joined Serie D club F.C.
